# About

Senior Unity & Tools Developer with 5+ years of experience in the mobile gaming industry, specializing in internal tools, editor extensions, automation, and CI/CD workflows that empower multidisciplinary teams.

Highly proficient in C# and Python for scripting, rapid prototyping, and pipeline development. Skilled at building scalable development environments, identifying bottlenecks, and delivering efficient solutions that improve team workflows, stability, and iteration speed across mobile games.

  • ‚ñ∏ VELO Games - Building comprehensive Match-3 ecosystem (level editor, admin suite, LiveOps panel)
  • ‚ñ∏ Developing scalable backend integrations with Firebase (auth, payments, anti-cheat, data-backup)
  • ‚ñ∏ Creating automation scripts and editor extensions to reduce manual work and support faster iteration
  • ‚ñ∏ Exploring advanced Unity optimization techniques and modern architecture patterns

## Achievements

  • ‚úì Shipped 35+ game projects (20+ prototypes + production titles) across 5 years
  • ‚úì Achieved 500K+ organic downloads on "Yes or No" hyper-casual game with ~30% D1 retention
  • ‚úì Optimized "Sort Away" build size from 120MB ‚Üí 21MB (-83%) via IL2CPP stripping & AssetBundles
  • ‚úì Improved "Pixel Warriors" save/load performance by ~50% using Google Protobuf
  • ‚úì "Pizza Guys" KPI wins: CPI $1.44‚Üí$0.97, D7 Retention 4%‚Üí15%, D0 Playtime 737s‚Üí1895s
  • ‚úì Achieved 60 FPS on mid-range devices through optimization techniques
  • ‚úì Eliminated GC spikes achieving zero GC allocation per frame on key loops
  • ‚úì Scaled 10k+ NPC pathfinding with Jobs System + Burst, reducing CPU usage by ~45%
  • ‚úì Built reusable mechanics templates reducing prototype build time by ~40%
